sentences.en: a spotlessly clean kitchen
sentences.cn: 一尘不染的厨房

sentences.en: Accusations of tax evasion have tarnished his clean image.
sentences.cn: 避税的指控使他的清白形象蒙污。

sentences.en: And while I'm out you might clean up the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候，你打扫一下厨房总该可以吧。

sentences.en: Anne comes in to clean twice a week.
sentences.cn: 安妮每周来清扫两次。

sentences.en: Are your hands clean?
sentences.cn: 你的手干净吗？

sentences.en: As usual, she left her room clean and tidy before going to school.
sentences.cn: 和往常一样，她去上学之前把房间收拾得干干净净。

sentences.en: Clean the mussels and discard any that do not close.
sentences.cn: 把贻贝洗干净，凡是合不上口的都扔掉。

sentences.en: clean towels
sentences.cn: 干净的毛巾

sentences.en: cleaned out the incompetent workers.
sentences.cn: 将不称职的工人扫地出门

sentences.en: cleaned up during the bull market.
sentences.cn: 在牛市时获得暴利

sentences.en: cleaned up the unpaid bills.
sentences.cn: 付清未付的账单

sentences.en: Fans of electric cars say they are clean, quiet and economical.
sentences.cn: 电动汽车迷们说，电动车清洁、无噪音而且经济。

sentences.en: He rubbed and rubbed but couldn't seem to get clean.
sentences.cn: 他擦了又擦，可就是擦不干净。

sentences.en: I want you to get those plates as clean as a whistle .
sentences.cn: 我要你把那些盘子擦洗得干干净净。

sentences.en: I would love a hot bath and clean clothes.
sentences.cn: 要是能洗个热水澡、换身干净的衣服就太好了。

sentences.en: If you kept your nose clean, you had a job for life.
sentences.cn: 如果你规规矩矩，就可以一辈子都捧着这个饭碗。

sentences.en: Is it easy to clean ?
sentences.cn: 清理起来容易吗？

sentences.en: It burned clean through the seat of my overalls.
sentences.cn: 它把我工装裤屁股那块烧透了。

sentences.en: Make sure you keep the wound clean .
sentences.cn: 一定要保持伤口清洁。

sentences.en: Mary cooked and cleaned for them.
sentences.cn: 玛丽为他们做饭、打扫卫生。

sentences.en: Maybe this guy isn't so squeaky clean after all.
sentences.cn: 也许这个人说到底品行并非那么完美。

sentences.en: no one involved in the conflict has clean hands.
sentences.cn: 牵扯进此冲突的人无一人是清白的。

sentences.en: Oh, don’t get mad - it’s just good clean fun !
sentences.cn: 噢，不要生气——这不过是个正经的玩笑嘛！

sentences.en: She wanted to make a clean break from her mother and father.
sentences.cn: 她想和父母一刀两断。

sentences.en: She would clean the house from top to bottom.
sentences.cn: 她会把房子彻底打扫一下。

sentences.en: the Chancellor must come clean about his plans for increasing taxation.
sentences.cn: 首相必须毫无保留地公布其增加赋税的计划。

sentences.en: The drill should be slowly rotated to ensure a clean hole.
sentences.cn: 钻头必须缓慢转动，以保证钻孔平整光滑。

sentences.en: The nation's advertisers need to clean up their act.
sentences.cn: 该国的广告商需要规范自己的行为。

sentences.en: The robbery cleaned us out.
sentences.cn: 强盗把我们洗劫一空

sentences.en: They were more concerned about the dogs' welfare than a clean getaway.
sentences.cn: 他们更加关心那些狗的安危，而非自己如何干净利落地脱身。

sentences.en: Why not wipe the slate clean and start all over again?
sentences.cn: 为什么不洗心革面、从头来过呢？

sentences.en: Wipe that sink clean when you’re done.
sentences.cn: 洗完后将水槽擦干净。

sentences.en: Your shoes need cleaning .
sentences.cn: 你的鞋该刷一刷了。

words.tran_cn: 可弄干净的；可扫除干净的
[化工] 清洁剂；清洁工；干洗店；干洗商；洗洁器
清洁剂；清洁工；擦亮粉；使清洁的东西

phrases.tran_cn: 无火花断路；清洁断电器
&I{【俚语】} 洗劫：剥夺全部的钱财或物质财富
(北美，非正式)将（某人）痛打一顿
&I{【俚语】} 赚钱，发大财：获得巨大收益，通常指在很短一段时间内
(非正式)开始检点行事（尤指戒烟、戒毒、不犯罪）
(非正式)和盘托出；毫无保留；说实话
（对于不道德行为）清白，无可谴责
[口语]使不弄脏；使不失体统，使不粗野，使不下流
洁身自好；不同流合污；不染指（不道德行为）
保持个人卫生，保持自身清洁

phrases.phrase: make a clean breast of something (或 make a clean b
phrases.tran_cn: 全盘招供；全盘承认过错

phrases.phrase: make a clean job of something

trans.tran_cn: 干净的，无污染的，清白的，清新的，公平的，完全的，简洁的

trans.tran_en: a process in which you clean something
If you clean a room or house, you make the inside of it and the furniture in it free from dirt and dust
to remove dirt from something by rubbing or washing
to clean a building or other people’s houses as your job
